name: Project Q-Pid
description:
This game was made for the Brackeys 2022.2 game jam.

By: No whOne, Pazzi

Controls:

- WASD: Move

- Space: Dash 

How to play:

You play as a cupid, whose job is to bring the ememies together so that they become friends. Enemies are only attracted to those of the same type as them. Move around the level to find the enemies. Whenever enemies get together, they each give a heart and will disappear from existence. Watch out! You will have to trigger the enemy to make them follow you, but once they're triggered, they will always chase you while trying to shoot you down. There also traps placed acrross the level that will try to shoot you.

Credits:

Programming: No whOne

Art and Animations: Pazzi

Music: No whOne 

Sound effects: freesound.org, rsfx.me

Font: heaval
